snippet: SILVER--Thelma, 95, died peacefully at her Jamaica, NY home on Tuesday, May 3, 2016. Happily married for more than half a century to the late Arthur, she was cherished by three generations of family--Eric, Ellen, Stevie, Matthew, Dee, Andrew, Melinda, and Ruthie-- and countless friends. She worked for more than a quarter century as an editorial proofreader at Queens College. Services will be held on Thursday, May 5 at 11:00am at Sinai Chapels, Fresh Meadows, Queens, 718-445-0300. 1/3
